definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: heavy, a burden Ps 38:5; hands (weary of holding up) Ex 17:12 (E), hair of head 2Sa 14:26, a corpulent old man 1Sa 4:18; [[עַם כֶבֶד עָוֹן]] Is 1:4 a people heavy with (the burden of) iniquity; a cloud charged with rain Ex 19:16 (E); a rock of large size Is 32:2; oppressive, grievous, burdensome, a yoke 1Ki 12:4, 1Ki 12:11 = 2Ch 10:4, 2Ch 10:11; a famine Ge 12:10, Ge 41:31, Ge 43:1, Ge 47:4, Ge 47:13 (J); the vexation ([[כַּעַס]]) of a fool Pr 27:3; vehement, sore, of a mourning Ge 50:11(J).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: massive, abundant, numerous, of a people [[עַם]] Nu 20:20 (J) 1Ki 3:9; army [[חיל]] 2Ki 6:14, 2Ki 18:14 = Is 36:2 insect swarm Ex 8:20 (J).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: heavy, dull of speech and tongue Ex 4:10, Ex 4:10 (JE); of the [[לֵב]], hard Ex 7:14 (J).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: hard, difficult, of a thing to be done Ex 18:18 (E) Nu 11:14 (J); of a language to be understood Ez Eze 3:5, Eze 3:6.
in the usage of J [[כָּבֵד מְאׂד]] is frequent:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: very oppressive, grievous, of hail Ex 9:18, Ex 9:24; murrain Ex 9:8; lamentation Ge 50:10.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: very numerous, cattle Ex 12:38; army, [[מַחֲנֶה]] Ge 50:9; locusts Ex 10:14; so [[חַיִל]] 1Ki 10:2 = 2Ch 9:1.
